resources.string: Login with a Pokemon Trainer Club account

This is an unofficial login to the Pokemon Go servers, so you can scan for Pokemon without using a third-party server. Your credentials will not be remembered unless you allow it, and they will not be shared with anyone (besides the Pokemon Go servers).

I recommend creating a dummy account to use with this app to make sure your real account does not get soft banned.

LOGIN AT YOUR OWN RISK
Login failed. Could be invalid credentials or servers could be down. Please try again in a few minutes.
Trying to login to Pokemon Go servers. This could take a while if the servers are overloaded.

string.name: createAccountMessage
string.a: Don\'t have an account? Create one!

resources.string: Are you sure you want to log out?

Make sure to enable Location Services for the best app experience.\n\nWARNING: Be careful when using this app. Scanning could get your account banned, so use a dummy account for this app, or at least make the scans look believable. Have fun!
Cannot detect Location Services. Please enable Location Services for the best experience.

You can adjust the scan distance and total scan time. The scanner will scan from your position and from 8 surrounding positions which are determined by the scan distance. This will simulate you walking around a larger area, which gives better scan readings.\n\nBeware of setting values that give you an unreasonable simulated movement speed because that could increase the chances of your account getting banned.
Scan your nearby area for Pokemon
Set the distance and time of your scan
Search for any location in the world to move to it
